meanings.sent1: Wearing pajamas to a job interview is misbecoming.
meanings.sent2: Her loud laughter at the funeral was misbecoming.
meanings.sent3: It was misbecoming when the cat tried to wear a hat.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds were misbecoming of the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The muddy shoes were misbecoming on the clean carpet.

meanings.definition: Unattractive or unflattering in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The old, torn shirt looked misbecoming on him.
meanings.sent2: Her messy hair was misbecoming for the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The misbehaving puppy had a misbecoming charm.
meanings.sent4: The cracked mirror reflected a misbecoming image.
meanings.sent5: The wilted flowers were misbecoming in the vase.
